item.text: Remind them to be subject to rulers and authorities, to be obedient, to be ready for every good work.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4218" class="">once</st> <st data-num="453" class="">foolish</st>, <st data-num="545" class="">disobedient</st>, <st data-num="4105" class="">misled</st>, <st data-num="1398" class="">enslaved</st> to <st data-num="4164" class="">various</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">passions</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2237">desires</st>, <st data-num="1236" class="">spending</st> our <st data-num="1236" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2549" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5355" class="">envy</st>, <st data-num="4767" class="">hateful</st> and <st data-num="3404" class="">hating</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>.

<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161">But</st> “<st data-num="3753">when</st> the <st data-num="5544" class="">kindness</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="5363">love for mankind</st> <st data-num="2014" class="">appeared</st>,

<st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> he <st data-num="1632">poured out</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> in <st data-num="4146">full measure</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st>.
And so, since we have been justified by his grace, we become heirs with the confident expectation of eternal life.”

This saying is trustworthy, and I want you to insist on such truths, so that those who have placed their faith in God may be intent on engaging in good works. These things are good and beneficial for all people.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4026" class="">avoid</st> <st data-num="3474" class="">foolish</st> <st data-num="2214" class="">controversies</st>, <st data-num="1076" class="">genealogies</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2054" class="">quarrels</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3163" class="">fights</st> about the <st data-num="3544" class="">law</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="512" class="">useless</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3152" class="">empty</st>.

<st data-num="3868" class="">Reject</st> a <st data-num="141" class="">divisive</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1208" class="">two</st> <st data-num="3559" class="">warnings</st>.
You know that such a person is twisted by sin and is conscious of it himself.
When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you, do your best to come to me at Nicopolis, for I have decided to spend the winter there.

<st data-num="4311" class="">Make</st> <st data-num="4709" class="">every effort</st> to <st data-num="4311" class="">help</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2211" class="">Zenas</st> the <st data-num="3544" class="">lawyer</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="625" class="">Apollos</st> <st data-num="4311" class="">on their way</st>; make sure <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> have what <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="3007">need</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161">Here</st> is <st data-num="2532">another</st> way that our <st data-num="2251" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> can <st data-num="3129" class="">learn</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="4291" class="">engage</st> in <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> meet <st data-num="316" class="">pressing</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">needs</st> <st data-num="2443">and so</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="175" class="">unfruitful</st>.
Everyone with me greets you. Greet those who love us in the faith. Grace be with you all.
